name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience creating high-performance, scalable applications. Proficient in **C#.NET Core**, **SQL**, **Docker**, and leveraging Agile methodologies for project management. Expertise in **VoIP** technologies, including **SIP**, **RTP**, and **PBX**, with a strong grasp of multithreading and distributed services. Well-versed in version control using **Git** and implementing build pipelines with **Team City**. 
Skilled in delivering innovative solutions through Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) using **SpecFlow**. With hands-on experience in **Linux** environments and networking tools like **Wireshark**, I bring a comprehensive toolkit for developing robust applications. Additionally, my background in full stack development enables effective collaboration across frontend and backend technologies, including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, and **Node.js**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms and cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
